title: How to Make Gluten Free Shortbread

steps.headline: Sift cornstarch, sugar and rice flour together.
steps.description: If you don't have a sifter, try using a whip to mix/sift the dry ingredients.

steps.headline: Mix with hands until soft dough forms.
Shape dough into 2 ⁄2 centimeter (1.0 in) balls.
Place about 3 centimeter (1.2 in) apart on greased cookie sheet
Bake at 150ºC or 300ºF for 20-25 minutes or until edges are lightly browned.
Roll in finely crushed corn flakes or crushed nuts.
Press top of ball with thumb.
Mix in 2 tablespoons of finely chopped peel and/or 2 tablespoons  finely chopped nuts.

text: Classic Sift cornstarch, sugar and rice flour together. If you don't have a sifter, try using a whip to mix/sift the dry ingredients. Add butter.  Mix with hands until soft dough forms.  Refrigerate one hour.  Shape dough into 2 ⁄2 centimeter (1.0 in) balls.  Place about 3 centimeter (1.2 in) apart on greased cookie sheet  Flatten with lightly floured fork.  Bake at 150ºC or 300ºF for 20-25 minutes or until edges are lightly browned.  Coated Shortbread Form balls as above.  Roll in finely crushed corn flakes or crushed nuts.  Press top of ball with thumb.  Add a dab of jelly.  Nuts and Zest Mix in 2 tablespoons of finely chopped peel and/or 2 tablespoons  finely chopped nuts.  Add 1 tablespoon lemon zest  Flatten with lightly floured fork.  Finished.
